titles.title: A joint resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that following the achievement of a balanced budget, any existing budget surplus should be applied to reducing the national debt.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.
Referred to Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Requires any Federal budget surplus existing following the achievement of a balanced budget to be applied on an annual basis to reduce the national debt. Declares that reducing the national debt should be a major goal of U.S. fiscal policy.
